2024 年 4 月 24 日星期三 12:13:29 +0000每日 TED 演讲（标清视频） https://www.ted.com/talks TED - TED.com TED 是一个致力于传播值得传播的想法的非营利组织。在此视频中，您将看到一些世界领先的思想家和实干家在 TED 会议、TEDx 活动和世界各地合作伙伴活动的舞台上发表演讲，激发、激发和激发他们的想象力。该播客还提供高清视频和纯音频格式。 TED 会议上值得传播的想法泰德TED 是一个致力于传播值得传播的想法的非营利组织。在此视频中，您将看到一些世界领先的思想家和实干家在 TED 会议、TEDx 活动和世界各地合作伙伴活动的舞台上发表演讲，激发、激发和激发他们的想象力。该播客还提供高清视频和纯音频格式。 zh知识共享：https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-nd/4.0/泰德contact@ted.com https://pl.tedcdn.com/rss_feed_images/ted_talks_main_podcast/video.png每日 TED 演讲（标清视频） https://www.ted.com/talks 144 144 科学技术娱乐设计 TED、TEDTalks、TED 演讲、灵感、创造力、技术演示、教育不非成人的
有说服力的讲故事的艺术 |凯利·D·帕克凯利·D·帕克"Storytelling is one of the most powerful marketing and leadership tools there is," says communications expert Kelly D. Parker. She explains how stories make proposals of all kinds more memorable — and shows how you can craft a compelling narrative to connect, persuade and drive meaningful action.有说服力的讲故事的艺术 |凯利·D·帕克"Storytelling is one of the most powerful marketing and leadership tools there is," says communications expert Kelly D. Parker. She explains how stories make proposals of all kinds more memorable — and shows how you can craft a compelling narrative to connect, persuade and drive meaningful action. https://www.ted.com/talks/kelly_d_parker_the_art_of_persuasive_storytelling?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:128040 128040 Tue, 23 Apr 2024 14:47:31 +0000高等教育不00:12:19泰德
气候解决方案？代代相传的智慧 |路易丝·马布罗路易丝·马布罗Louise Mabulo grew up on seemingly strange farming tips from her parents and grandparents — like planting crops during a full moon or burying a rock beneath them. Now a farmer and climate activist herself, she sees how these practical nuggets of wisdom actually have scientific merit. Learn how she's merging traditional knowledge with modern science to help farmers (and the world) adapt to a changing climate.气候解决方案？代代相传的智慧 |路易丝·马布罗Louise Mabulo grew up on seemingly strange farming tips from her parents and grandparents — like planting crops during a full moon or burying a rock beneath them. Now a farmer and climate activist herself, she sees how these practical nuggets of wisdom actually have scientific merit. Learn how she's merging traditional knowledge with modern science to help farmers (and the world) adapt to a changing climate. https://www.ted.com/talks/louise_mabulo_a_climate_solution_the_wisdom_passed_down_through_ Generations?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:127861 127861 Mon, 22 Apr 2024 15:08:21 +0000高等教育不00:06:52泰德
人工智能正在转变为全新的事物 |穆斯塔法·苏莱曼穆斯塔法·苏莱曼When it comes to artificial intelligence, what are we actually creating? Even those closest to its development are struggling to describe exactly where things are headed, says Microsoft AI CEO Mustafa Suleyman, one of the primary architects of the AI models many of us use today. He offers an honest and compelling new vision for the future of AI, proposing an unignorable metaphor — a new digital species — to focus attention on this extraordinary moment. (Followed by a Q&A with head of TED Chris Anderson)人工智能正在转变为全新的事物 |穆斯塔法·苏莱曼When it comes to artificial intelligence, what are we actually creating? Even those closest to its development are struggling to describe exactly where things are headed, says Microsoft AI CEO Mustafa Suleyman, one of the primary architects of the AI models many of us use today. He offers an honest and compelling new vision for the future of AI, proposing an unignorable metaphor — a new digital species — to focus attention on this extraordinary moment. (Followed by a Q&A with head of TED Chris Anderson) https://www.ted.com/talks/mustafa_suleyman_ai_is_turning_into_something_totally_new?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:129248 129248 Mon, 22 Apr 2024 14:58:04 +0000高等教育不00:21:57泰德
AI将如何走出屏幕进入现实世界 |丹妮拉·罗斯丹妮拉·罗斯The convergence of AI and robotics will unlock a wonderful new world of possibilities in everyday life, says robotics and AI pioneer Daniela Rus. Diving into the way machines think, she reveals how "liquid networks" — a revolutionary class of AI that mimics the neural processes of simple organisms — could help intelligent machines process information more efficiently and give rise to "physical intelligence" that will enable AI to operate beyond digital confines and engage dynamically in the real world. AI将如何走出屏幕进入现实世界 |丹妮拉·罗斯The convergence of AI and robotics will unlock a wonderful new world of possibilities in everyday life, says robotics and AI pioneer Daniela Rus. Diving into the way machines think, she reveals how "liquid networks" — a revolutionary class of AI that mimics the neural processes of simple organisms — could help intelligent machines process information more efficiently and give rise to "physical intelligence" that will enable AI to operate beyond digital confines and engage dynamically in the real world. https://www.ted.com/talks/daniela_rus_how_ai_will_step_off_the_screen_and_into_the_real_world?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:129088 129088 Fri, 19 Apr 2024 14:48:18 +0000高等教育不00:12:51泰德
如何成为一名积极的公民并引发变革|加布里埃尔·马尔门蒂尼加布里埃尔·马尔门蒂尼What does it mean to be an active citizen? It's about more than just voting and paying taxes, says social entrepreneur Gabriel Marmentini. He explains why we can't rely on the state alone to solve all our problems — and presents the four key ingredients for anyone to become a change-maker and engage in solving public issues.如何成为一名积极的公民并引发变革|加布里埃尔·马尔门蒂尼What does it mean to be an active citizen? He explains why we can't rely on the state alone to solve all our problems — and presents the four key ingredients for anyone to become a change-maker and engage in solving public issues. https://www.ted.com/talks/gabriel_marmentini_how_to_be_an_active_citizen_and_spark_change?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:127048 127048 Thu, 18 Apr 2024 14:58:33 +0000高等教育不00:10:14泰德
巴勒斯坦人和以色列人面对面|阿齐兹·阿布·萨拉和毛兹·伊农阿齐兹·阿布·萨拉和毛兹·伊农How can Israelis and Palestinians achieve peace? Palestinian peacemaker Aziz Abu Sarah and Israeli peacemaker Maoz Inon discuss the immeasurable tragedies they've experienced growing up in the region — and how they choose reconciliation over revenge, again and again. With a fierce belief in a better future, they talk about conflict, safety, finding shared values and how they're building a coalition of Israeli and Palestinian citizens who are intent on creating a path to hope and peace.巴勒斯坦人和以色列人面对面|阿齐兹·阿布·萨拉和毛兹·伊农How can Israelis and Palestinians achieve peace? With a fierce belief in a better future, they talk about conflict, safety, finding shared values and how they're building a coalition of Israeli and Palestinian citizens who are intent on creating a path to hope and peace. https://www.ted.com/talks/aziz_abu_sarah_and_maoz_inon_a_palestinian_and_an_israeli_face_to_face?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:129029 129029 Wed, 17 Apr 2024 14:58:21 +0000高等教育不00:17:25泰德
您可以采取哪些措施来制止经济犯罪|半城塞伯特半城塞伯特It might sound like the plot of a movie, but economic crime is all around us — from drug trafficking and fraud to cybercrimes, tax evasion and more. Economic crime fighter Hanjo Seibert breaks down the complexities of money laundering and how we can all wield our collective power to dismantle the underworld economy and turn off the money tap for criminals.您可以采取哪些措施来制止经济犯罪|半城塞伯特It might sound like the plot of a movie, but economic crime is all around us — from drug trafficking and fraud to cybercrimes, tax evasion and more. 为什么你要让父母失望？德西丽·阿卡万德西丽·阿卡万When filmmaker Desiree Akhavan told her Iranian immigrant parents she was in love with a woman, she knew they would object. She explains why it's worth the risk to let people get to know the real you.为什么你要让父母失望？德西丽·阿卡万When filmmaker Desiree Akhavan told her Iranian immigrant parents she was in love with a woman, she knew they would object. 大麻可以帮助睡眠吗？这就是科学 |珍·沃尔什珍·沃尔什Can cannabis actually treat insomnia? It's complicated, says sleep physiologist Jen Walsh. While the plant has been used across time and cultures, there's been little scientific research on how it impacts sleep disorders like insomnia. That's precisely where she and her team come in. Learn about the world's first study into the potential of medicinal cannabis as a safe, accessible treatment to help us all rest easy.大麻可以帮助睡眠吗？这就是科学 |珍·沃尔什Can cannabis actually treat insomnia? It's complicated, says sleep physiologist Jen Walsh. While the plant has been used across time and cultures, there's been little scientific research on how it impacts sleep disorders like insomnia. That's precisely where she and her team come in. Learn about the world's first study into the potential of medicinal cannabis as a safe, accessible treatment to help us all rest easy. https://www.ted.com/talks/jen_walsh_can_cannabis_help_you_sleep_here_s_the_science?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:127365 127365 Wed, 10 Apr 2024 14:43:46 +0000高等教育不00:11:27泰德
开垦原住民土地的新国家公园 |特蕾西·雷维斯特蕾西·雷维斯In a part of the United States with more than 17,000 years of human history, cultural preservation advocate Tracie Revis is working to turn the Ocmulgee Mounds into Georgia's first national park and preserve. This park would be co-managed by the Muscogee (Creek) Nation, bringing the tribal voice back to an area they were forcibly removed from 200 years ago. Revis explores the complex feelings of caring for this land and shows how it's fostering healing in return.开垦原住民土地的新国家公园 |特蕾西·雷维斯In a part of the United States with more than 17,000 years of human history, cultural preservation advocate Tracie Revis is working to turn the Ocmulgee Mounds into Georgia's first national park and preserve. This park would be co-managed by the Muscogee (Creek) Nation, bringing the tribal voice back to an area they were forcibly removed from 200 years ago. Revis explores the complex feelings of caring for this land and shows how it's fostering healing in return. https://www.ted.com/talks/tracie_revis_a_new_national_park_to_reclaim_indigenous_land?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:121120 121120 Tue, 09 Apr 2024 14:50:31 +0000高等教育不00:06:59泰德
想法改变一切——TED 的下一步是什么？克里斯·安德森和莫尼克·拉夫·贝尔克里斯·安德森和莫尼克·拉夫·贝尔TED is on a mission to discover and champion the ideas that will shape tomorrow. Reflecting on the evolution of that mission, TED's Chris Anderson and Monique Ruff-Bell cast a visionary gaze on the organization's future — including a revamped tagline, a renewed emphasis on debate and the launch of an exciting new conference — and explore the indispensable role of ideas in navigating societal challenges and fostering global innovation. Learn more about TED's enduring legacy, its path forward for the decades ahead and how you can join us in sparking a brighter future.想法改变一切——TED 的下一步是什么？克里斯·安德森和莫尼克·拉夫·贝尔TED is on a mission to discover and champion the ideas that will shape tomorrow. Reflecting on the evolution of that mission, TED's Chris Anderson and Monique Ruff-Bell cast a visionary gaze on the organization's future — including a revamped tagline, a renewed emphasis on debate and the launch of an exciting new conference — and explore the indispensable role of ideas in navigating societal challenges and fostering global innovation. Learn more about TED's enduring legacy, its path forward for the decades ahead and how you can join us in sparking a brighter future. https://www.ted.com/talks/chris_anderson_and_monique_ruff_bell_ideas_change_everything_and_what_s_next_for_ted?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:127922 127922 Tue, 09 Apr 2024 14:40:55 +0000高等教育不00:20:38泰德
